attributes.action: Regulate Advertisements in respect of relationships when in direct conflict with televised prime Time Uk soaps.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put some type of Governmental seperation[LOGO] on advertising to condone behaviour on UK television which causes loss of impact, earnings and response of the advising social behaviour in the advertisement.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
